ch0006_00_oba/0101_0701_01_10:
Yo! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I could feel your fiery spirit!
ch0006_00_oba/0601_0701_01_10:
Yo! Hiya!
You got a moment for a quick chat?
ch0006_00_oba/0601_0701_02_10:
You know, Infernape’s fire on its head keeps
burning for its whole life.
ch0006_00_oba/0601_0701_03_10:
And don’t you think my hairdo is like a
raging fire, too?
ch0006_00_oba/0601_0701_04_10:
We’ve got pretty similar heads, right?
Heh, it really makes me feel like we’re partners!
ch0006_00_oba/0601_0702_01_10: Infernape’s fire keeps burning for its whole life.
ch0006_00_oba/0601_0702_02_10:
It’s a great partner to me, with a burning body
and a burning heart!
ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_01_10:
Sometimes people say that as a member of the
Sinnoh Elite Four, I should dress more properly.
ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_02_10: But see, this is my style!
ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_03_10:
I told them, if you’re going to change your whole
style just ’cause someone told you to, that’s
not very proper as a Trainer, you know?
ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_04_10:
Of course, the day after I said that, I went
and burned my foot on Infernape’s fire.
ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_05_10:
Turns out wearing flip-flops has drawbacks.
If someone gives you some advice, you should
at least listen!
ch0006_00_oba/0602_0702_01_10:
Listening to people’s advice is definitely good,
but that doesn’t mean you always have to do
as they say.
ch0006_00_oba/0602_0702_02_10:
At the end of the day, it’s up to you.
Just don’t be stubborn for no reason!
ch0006_00_oba/0603_0701_01_10:
My partner’s Infernape!
He moves with blinding speed 
and can unleash powerful blows!
ch0006_00_oba/0603_0701_02_10:
His punches are so quick!
How quick, you say? Well, uh...
Super quick!
ch0006_00_oba/0603_0701_03_10:
You can actually follow his movements, 
since he leaves a trail of fire.
ch0006_00_oba/0603_0702_01_10:
Infernape’s the one that helps me do my hair!
He can help me dry it at Mach speed!
ch0006_00_oba/0603_0702_02_10:
Sometimes it misses and smacks into my head.
If you ever see me rolling around on the ground
in pain, that’s what happened.
ch0006_00_oba/0604_0701_01_10:
Back when I’d just joined the Elite Four,
I’d always battle with Drifblim.
ch0006_00_oba/0604_0701_02_10:
I met it as a Drifloon at the Valley Windworks.
I think it was on a Friday.
ch0006_00_oba/0604_0701_03_10:
I could sense it had a burning soul,
so I decided to raise it!
ch0006_00_oba/0604_0702_01_10:
Drifloon and Drifblim both have
burning-hot spirit!
ch0006_00_oba/0604_0702_02_10:
It’s said that they even carry away
people’s spirits, after all!
ch0006_00_oba/0605_0701_01_10:
Yo! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You remind me of a friend of mine.
ch0006_00_oba/0605_0701_02_10:
His name’s Volkner.
Every time I get burnt out, he comes along
and gives me a recharge!
ch0006_00_oba/0605_0701_03_10:
It goes both ways, though. When he’s in a funk,
it’s up to me to light a fire in his heart!
ch0006_00_oba/0605_0702_01_10:
If you remind me of Volkner, that means you’re
burning hot, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0006_00_oba/0605_0702_02_10:
Let’s keep burning hot together, all right?
You’re my kind of Trainer!
ch0006_00_oba/1701_0701_01_10:
Yo! Perfect timing. I was cleaning out my room
and found something good!
ch0006_00_oba/1701_0701_02_10:
You can have it!
Hope it helps you burn even hotter!
ch0006_00_oba/1701_0702_01_10:
It may have been something Lopunny hid in
my hair.
ch0006_00_oba/1701_0702_02_10: I think it uses my hair as its nest or something.
ch0006_00_oba/2501_0701_01_10:
Hey, I consider you a friend!
So, let me tell you the key to battles!
ch0006_00_oba/2501_0701_02_10:
The most important things for winning battles
is a burning heat!
ch0006_00_oba/2501_0701_03_10:
You’ve got to set your spirit on fire and burn
and burn and BURN!
ch0006_00_oba/2501_0702_01_10:
That feeling of giving your absolute 100 percent
best in a battle and burning down to cinders...
ch0006_00_oba/2511_0701_02_10:
whether I’m having a meal or taking a bath,
I’ll always come and help you out!
ch0006_00_oba/2511_0701_03_10:
After all, isn’t that what friends are for?
We help each other out!
ch0006_00_oba/2511_0701_04_10:
Of course, I tend to be clean out of batteries
after each battle.
ch0006_00_oba/2511_0701_05_10:
You’ll probably have to help me out a lot more
than I’ll need to help you!
ch0006_00_oba/2511_0702_02_10: Our battles have heat and burning spirit.
ch0006_00_oba/2511_0702_03_10: Let’s show the whole world our bright fire!
ch0006_00_oba/3001_0701_01_10:
Hey, you’re lookin’ good this morning!
How ’bout a sizzling-hot Pokémon battle?
ch0006_00_oba/3002_0701_01_10:
I make sure to wake up early, you know? It
takes a healthy lifestyle to keep the fire burning!
ch0006_00_oba/3003_0701_01_10:
Yo! Hope you’re not overheating.
There’s still plenty of daytime to enjoy!
ch0006_00_oba/3004_0701_01_10:
Don’t forget to eat lunch!
You’ll be sorry if you’re all burned out!
ch0006_00_oba/3005_0701_01_10:
Ah... I think I had too many battles today.
I’m all burned out...
ch0006_00_oba/3006_0701_01_10:
Early to bed and early to rise.
I want to be ready for tomorrow’s battles!
